question_template: A simply supported steel beam with a span of [[params.span]] [[params.unitsSpan]] carries a point load of [[params.load]] [[params.unitsForce]] at its center. If the beam has a rectangular cross-section of width [[params.width]] [[params.unitsDist]] and height [[params.height]] [[params.unitsDist]], what is the maximum bending stress in the beam? (Give your answer in [[params.unitsStress]] .)
title: BendingStressInSimplySupportedBeam
